name: Dodge and Weave, Weave and Dodge
name_original: Dodge and Weave, Weave and Dodge
description:
Dodge and Weave, Weave and Dodge is an arcade platformer where the player must dodge all the projectiles coming after them. It's a game that gets increasingly difficult as the speed of the projectiles increases. Can you weave and dodge?

The game controls are as follows:

  • Arrow Keys or W/A/S/D: Move
  • P/Escape: Pauses
